    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100062</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100062</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Density</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Densité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Densidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Densità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυκνότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Densidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens when iron, beeswax and cork, which have different densities, are made to float on olive oil and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beeswax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cork</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">olive oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was geschieht, wenn Eisen,
Bienenwachs und Korken, die unterschiedliche Dichten haben, gebildet 
werden, um auf Olivenöl und Wasser zu schwimmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui se produit quand 
du fer, la cire d'abeille et le liège, qui ont différentes 
densités, sont faits pour flotter sur l'huile et l'eau d'olive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece quando o 
ferro, o beeswax e a cortiça, que têm densidades diferentes, são 
feitos para flutuar no óleo verde-oliva e na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade 
quando il ferro, la cera d'api ed il sughero, che hanno densità 
differenti, sono fatti per galleggiare sull'olio e sull'acqua di 
oliva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει πότε ο 
σίδηρος, ο μελισσοκηρός και ο φελλός, που έχουν τις διαφορετικές 
πυκνότητες, γίνονται στο επιπλέον σώμα στο έλαιο και το ύδωρ 
ελιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede cuando el 
hierro, la cera de abejas y el corcho, que tienen diversas densidades,
se hacen para flotar en el aceite y el agua de oliva.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bienenwachs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Olivenöl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cire d'abeille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liège</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">densité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">huile d'olive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
